entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
